CustomField.formula: IF ( OR ( ISPICKVAL(Type,'Legal - New Customer'), ISPICKVAL(Type,'Legal - New Product'), ISPICKVAL(Type,'Legal - Thomson Elite'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Legal - Recovered Customer'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Legal - Recovered Product'), ISPICKVAL(Type,'Legal - New Converted Product'), ISPICKVAL(Type,'Legal - New Converted Customer'), ISPICKVAL(Type,'MDY'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Legal - Add-on module'), ISPICKVAL(Type,'Legal - Version License'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'License Conversion - Recurring Increase'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Legal - License Band Uplift'), ISPICKVAL(Type,'Legal - User Count Uplift'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Legal - Recurring Adjustment'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'License Conversion - Recurring Decrease'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Cancellation - Customer'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Cancellation - Module'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Cancellation - Product'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Downgrade - Product'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Legal - User Count Decrease'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Downgrade - License Conversion'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Cancellation - CPI'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Cancellation - Recurring Adjustment'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'ACV Downgrade/Partial ACV Cancellation'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'ACV Recovery/Partial ACV Reinstatement')), Maintenance_Amount__c, IF( ISPICKVAL(Forecasted_Outcome__c , 'Expect to Lose'), Concession_Amount__c, IF( ISPICKVAL(Forecasted_Outcome__c , 'Uncertain'), Concession_Amount__c, Maintenance_Amount__c ) ) )
CustomField.label: Commit Forecast Value
